text: Mariinsky () is a rural locality (a selo) in Otradovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 1,896 as of 2010. There are 23 streets. == Geography == It is located 5 km from Sterlitamak, 7 km from Novaya Otradovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Mariinsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
